ch.randelshofer.quaqua.colorchooser

Class HTMLSliderTextFieldHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.randelshofer.quaqua.colorchooser.HTMLSliderTextFieldHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener, javax.swing.event.DocumentListener

    public class HTMLSliderTextFieldHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.event.DocumentListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener
    This handler adjusts the value of a component in the HTML color slider model, when the user enters text into the text field.
    Version:
    1.0 November 22, 2005 Created.
    Author:
    Werner Randelshofer
